title: Rooms and Furniture 2
sentences: The refrigerator is in the kitchen.
We are baking a pizza in the oven.
Ich stelle das Glas in die
I put the glass in the dishwasher.
The washing machine is in the basement.
I need a fork to eat.
Where is the spoon for the soup?
The plate is made of white ceramic.
I am drinking tea from a cup/mug.
The kettle makes hot water quickly.
The coffee machine is unfortunately broken.
The remote control is lying on the sofa.
The radio is playing good music.
I need a pan for the egg.
The pot is on the stove.
We cook on the electric stove.
I vacuum with the vacuum cleaner.
The iron is still very hot.
I am lying on the mattress.
The trash can is full again.
The shower is in the bathroom.
I wash my hands in the sink.
The towel is in the closet.
dictionary:
der Kühlschrank - refrigerator
der Ofen - oven
die Spülmaschine - dishwasher
die Waschmaschine - washing machine
der Keller - basement
die Gabel - fork
das Messer - knife
der Löffel - spoon
der Teller - plate
die Tasse - cup/mug
der Wasserkocher - kettle
die Kaffeemaschine - coffee machine
der Fernseher - TV
die Fernbedienung - remote control
das Radio - radio
die Pfanne - pan
der Topf - pot
der Elektroherd (Herd) - electric stove
die Mikrowelle - microwave
der Staubsauger - vacuum cleaner
das Bügeleisen - iron
die Matratze - mattress
der Mülleimer - trash can
die Dusche - shower
das Waschbecken - sink
das Handtuch - towel
